about_the_game:
Home Alone


You wake up, not knowing who you are and dressed for an evening out to find yourself in the basement of a house filled with dead people. All doors and windows are barred and locked and you need to find a way out.

Gerald's Game


During the story you find out why a scientist has locked you in. The puzzles, keys and clues you need to find to escape explain the method behind the madness.

Don't Breathe


The puzzles are not the sole obstacle in your way. Doing certain actions may unlock hostile people still alive in the house. Death is also permanent. There are no save systems. If you die you start over. Smart players will find ways to rapidly get back to where they left off though.

Rear Window


In true voyeuristic manner the game is viewed through main fixed camera perspective to aid in the feeling of being watched closely.

Game Features
Dinner with Strangers is an explorative game where your only goal is to escape the prison of the house. In order to do this you will solve puzzles, find keys and do your best to avoid enemies that seem slightly familiar. The game is inspired by the original Resident Evil and Silent Hill series but is more focused on the story and atmosphere than action.

content_descriptors.notes: Dinner With Strangers contains blood, violence and death.

name: Dinner With Strangers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790 2GB VRAM*
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dinner With Strangers is a fixed camera style "escape room" game where you have to find a way out of the House of Modesty. You wake up not knowing who you are and why you are there to find everyone in the house dead.
